body:
Day 21 - 500*
Small and bad.
1/10.
To think that I would come here one day. The first time that I gave up I didn't expect to see someone that would believe in me at the comments. I gotta ask now, Crisfront, are you proud of what I have already achieve? And are you ready to see me achieve much more? 1000 is now on the horizon.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
